name: Shori
description: What is the project about? Teh Shori Project aims to provide a secure channel of communication to teh people via proven cryptographic protocols delivered through the medium of Blockchain. What makes your project unique? a vanilla secure messaging application interface has been provided for one and all to already begin transmitting their communication securely and privately. A Enhanced Web3 facilities will be made available on top of the existing layer, to yShori holders across the Ethereum mainnet and Shibarium itself. Additional features of Pools, Lockers and a Privacy Bridge to securely and privately transfer Crypto Tokens, are offered. History of your project. Shori recently launched and we are started to build the community. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Further enhance the Shori interface to support browser extensions and hand held devices via android and ios App. Launch the ShoriBridge, yShoriLocker and ShoriVaults across Shibarium and open the gateway to ETH mainnet usage for the same. Setup the Victory Council with top PoS participants and eminent industry stalwarts, who will ratify votes gathered at ShoriDAO for decision making. What can your token be used for? Multichain experience offering users the flexibility of moving across Ethereum and Shibarium. Participation in ShoriVaults. Fee redistribution via Shori ecosystem earnings from the Lockers and Vaults. Tool for Governance and PoS.
